isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - INTAKE AIR TEMPERATURE (IAT) SENSOR - FUNCTION

svcproc.title: FUNCTION
svcproc.para: The Navistar engine control system includes an Intake Air Temperature Sensor (IAT). The ECM measures the signal from the IAT sensor to determine the temperature of the air entering the engine. The ECM uses this data to adjust timing and fuel rate for starting in cold weather to limit smoke emissions.
